```{r}
#Average per capita grocery spending=grocery sales/population
```

```{r}
Avg_Capita_Grocery_Spending <- function(grocery_sales = 811541000000, population = 334233854) {
  grocery_sales / population
}
```

```{r}
Avg_Capita_Grocery_Spending(population = 4000000000)
```

```{r}
Adj_Capita_Grocery_Spend <- function(est_per_price_increase){
  Avg_Spend <- Avg_Capita_Grocery_Spending()
  Avg_Spend * (1+(est_per_price_increase/100))
}
```

```{r}
State_Adj_Capita_Grocery_Spend<- function(state_index){
  Adj_Avg_Spend<-Adj_Capita_Grocery_Spend
  Adj_Avg_Spend*(state_index/100)
}
```

```{r}
Total_Spend_Primary_Shoppers<-function(per_of_grocery_spend=0.6){
  per_capita_grocery_spend<-State_Adj_Capita_Grocery_Spend()
  num_shoppers<-number_of_shoppers()
  per_capita_grocery_spend*per_of_grocery_spend*num_shoppers
  #change number of shoppers according to the already formed function
}
Total_Spend_Secondary_Shoppers<-function(per_of_grocery_spend=0.25){
  per_capita_grocery_spend<-State_Adj_Capita_Grocery_Spend()
  num_shoppers<-number_of_shoppers()
  per_capita_grocery_spend*per_of_grocery_spend*num_shoppers
  #change number of shoppers according to the already formed function
}
Total_Spend_Rare_Shoppers<-function(per_of_grocery_spend=0.05){
  per_capita_grocery_spend<-State_Adj_Capita_Grocery_Spend()
  num_shoppers<-number_of_shoppers()
  per_capita_grocery_spend*per_of_grocery_spend*num_shoppers
  #change number of shoppers according to the already formed function
}
```

```{r}
Total_Estimate_Revenue<- function(){
  primary_spend<-Total_Spend_Primary_Shoppers()
  secondary_spend<-Total_Spend_Secondary_Shoppers()
  rare_spend<-Total_Spend_Rare_Shoppers()
  Total_Estimate_Revenue<-primary_spend+secondary_spend+rare_spend
}
```
